name: Daisy Chatbot

examples.text: I want a cap for the epcot park
What hats go with the epcot park?
Do you have hats for Hollywood Studios?
Yes. Are there hats for a Christmas visit?
Do you have star wars fabric?
Do you have a zebra pattern?
do you have any hats with polka dots?
Which hat is the best for polynesian resort
I can't decide which hat I like best
What all Animal Kingdom hats do you carry
Do you carry any epcot hats
I dont know which hat to pick
For my trip to disney world epcot
I want to order a hat for my epcot trip
I want to order a hat for my trip to epcot

intents.description: When a user needs suggestions on which hat to order
Start the conversation with a greeting and respond to greetings from users

examples.text: What kind of products do you sell?
What kind of store is this?
Can you wear them facing backwards?
Could you tell me about the shop?
What are personalized mouse ear caps?
Where can i find photos of the hats?

intents.description: To tell user what products are sold in the shop

examples.text: Do the hats snap in the back or velcro
Do you offer childrens size hats?
Are the hats for adults or children
Which direction does the hat face?
Hey daisy, what size hats do you offer?
Can my cap be worn both frontwards and backwards?

intents.description: To respond to user inquiries of fit and size

examples.text: How long does it take to recieve a hat?

intents.description: To understand user questions about shipping

examples.text: Do you have any red hats?
I'm looking for a purple hat
Do you have any lime green hats?

intents.description: To help Daisy recognize when a user is asking for a hat of a specific color

examples.text: what if my hat doesnt fit?
What if the cap is defective?

intents.description: To respond to user questions about returns
To recognize when a user expresses thanks

examples.text: how much do the hats cost?
Yes. How much do hats cost
What is the price of hats?

intents.description: To help Daisy recognize user request for price

examples.text: can you help me with this

intents.description: To describe Daisy's capabilities to a user

description: Our shop chatbot that provides assistance on product suggestions and basic procedures

values.text: We sell custom, personalized, and pre-designed Mouse Ear Baseball caps. All of our products are quality and made-to-order. Can I help you pick out the perfect hat?
I can help you pick the perfect Mouse Ear Baseball cap! Can you tell me a little bit more about what you're looking for? For example, do you need the cap for a specific event, park, or resort?

I apologize, I didn't understand. Can you reword your meaning? You might be looking for a Mouse Ear Baseball Cap theme that is currently out of stock. We frequently acquire more fabric options, so please contact the shop if you have any specific character/design/theme requests.

I apologize, I didn't understand. Can you try rephrasing that? You might be looking for a Mouse Ear Baseball Cap theme that is currently out of stock. We frequently acquire more fabric options, so please contact the shop if you have any specific character/design/theme requests.
Can I help you with anything else?
Have you seen our Spaceship Earth ear print? It's perfect for a day at EPCOT or in Future World!
I can help you pick the perfect Mouse Ear Baseball cap! Can you tell me a little bit more about what you're looking for? For example, do you need the cap for a specific event, park, or resort?
We have many dot-patterned mouse ears available. We have our colorful multi dot, a black dot, mustard dot, and a red dot

Have you seen our Fireworks Mouse Ear Baseball caps? Our Pre-Designed version is styled on a blue hat. You can also use the Custom hat option to create e personalized version of our Fireworks Mouse Ear Baseball Cap!
If you're looking for a food, snack, or dessert-themed Mouse Ear Baseball Cap, our donut ears are the perfect fit!
If you're looking for Christmas or Holiday ears, we suggest our red mickey fabric. It's the perfect way to celebrate the season in Mickey style!
Have you seen our Toy Icons ears? They pair perfectly with a bright-colored hat!
Have you seen our "paint splatter" fabric? It's the perfect way to show off your artistic side!
Our Star Wars Comic ears should fit the bill for any Star Wars fan!
We offer two tie-dye ear patterns, our large tie-dye and small tie-dye mouse ears.

For a springtime floral Mouse Ear Cap, I suggest looking at our orange floral, dusty blue floral or multifloral ears. My personal favorite combination for the Flower and Garden Festival is our "lemonade floral" ears (named after our favorite violet lemonade) paired with a pink or purple hat!

We have lots of animal print ear options that are perfect for a trip to Animal Kingdom, a stay at Animal Kingdom Lodge, or as an homage to your favorite Lion King characters! I suggest our zebra, cheetah, leopard, or giraffe ears if you're looking for a pattern, or our "lion pals" fabric if you'd like a character option.

We have lots of tropical ear options! These Mouse Ear Baseball Caps are the perfect way to celebrate a stay at the Polynesian or to share your love for your favorite character! (If those characters happen to be from Hawaii or Montu Nui). I suggest our Hawaiian floral, Island Stitch, pineapple, or Lilo and Stitch ears.
We have lots of Mickey and Minnie options to suit every taste. Check out our red dot, Diva Minnie, Classic Minnie, Mickey Expressions, and Red Mouse Ears fabric options.
Our "fiesta deco" ears are perfect for a summer fiesta, a stay at Coronado, or a walk around the Mexico pavilion!
You're welcome! Is there anything else I can help you with?
I'm glad I could help! Is there anything else I can help you with?
My pleasure. Is there anything else I can help you with?
You're very welcome. Is there anything else I can help you with?
It's my pleasure! Is there anything else I can help you with?

Due to the custom nature of our products and the fact that they are made-to-order, we do not accept returns. However, if you experience any issues with your order, please contact us and we will do our best to make it right!

We charge a five dollar flat shipping rate for the first hat. Each additional hat in the order is two dollars. Currently, we only ship to the continental 48 United States. All pre-designed mouse ear caps ship within 2-3 business days. Custom mouse ear caps ship within 5 business days. Personalized mouse ear caps can take up to 14 days for production, and will ship within 2-3 days post-production.
Our Pre-Designed Mouse Ear Baseball caps cost 19.00. Our Custom caps are 24.00 and our Pre-Designed caps are 32.00. Taxes and shipping are not included in those rates.
We offer lots of ear and hat combinations in different colors. Try our Custom Mouse Ear Baseball Caps which allow you to choose your own ear fabric and hat color.
Thank you for chatting with me today. Have a wonderful day!
Thanks for chatting with me. Have a great day!

I can help you pick out a hat by offering suggestions for different resorts, parks, and occasions. I can also help to answer some of your questions about our shop, including product information and our shipping policy.
Hi there! I'm here to help. Feel free to ask me for hat recommendations or other information about our shop, including what products we sell and shipping information.
Our caps are standard size and fit most adults. They also feature an adjustable back closure for a more comfortable and customized fit. They can be worn both frontwards and backwards.
Hi! My name is Daisy and I'm a chatbot. I can help you out with information about our shop or hat suggestions! What can I help you with?

counterexamples.text: Yeah so we're planning a trip to disney world in march
